paper_abstract: This paper presents a convergence analysis of particle swarm optimization system by treating it as a discrete-time linear time-variant system firstly. And then, based on the results of system convergence conditions, dynamic optimal control of a deterministic PSO system for parameters optimization is studied by using dynamic programming; and an approximate dynamic programming algorithm - swarm-based approximate dynamic programming (swarm-ADP) is proposed in this paper. Finally, numerical simulations proved the validated of this presented dynamic optimization method.
paper_title: Swarm-based approximate dynamic optimization process for discrete particle swarm optimization system
